'''Brightcrown Pigeon''' is a type of bird that can be found in the wild.

==Drops==
{{Card|Fowl|1}}

Killing one for the first time will add this creature's entry into the player's in-game [[archive]].

==Locations==
Can be found near the crafting bench and near the east dock of [[Liyue Harbor]].
